Birthday Parties

Party with us! Qualified coaches, movement games and a safe facility for an unforgettable celebration.

Book Now

Party Themes

OpenGym Party

Explore the gym at your own pace with coach-led games and supervised free time.

Gymnastics Party

Vault, bars, beam and floor with fun skill circuits, stations and team games.

UrbanGym Party

Obstacle flow, climbs and vaults with a parkour-inspired twist—safe, coached and epic.

Format, Times & Pricing

  • Session length: 2 hours (venue access total ~2.5 hours)
  • Setup/pack-up: 15 minutes either side
  • Typical slot: Saturdays 2:00pm – 4:00pm (subject to availability)
  • 1–10 participants: $350
  • 11–20 participants: $450
  • 21–30 participants: $550
  • 31–40 participants: $650
  • $50 non-refundable deposit required at booking
  • Balance due by COB Monday of party week
Book Now

Extras & Notes

  • Food, decorations & cutlery: BYO (tables & chairs provided)
  • Limited kitchen access available
  • Invitation template: Download party invitation (PDF)

Premier gymnastics training facility for all ages.
